document.title: Career and Technology Education Standards template

73C4847C9F964CF99D8802C706538333.description:
Demonstrate knowledge
of the impact of external
factors upon the textile,
apparel, and fashion
industries.

D40A3AE29DE44E92B0C3322EFA80F550.description:
Analyze
the effects of operational
procedures such as
security and inventory
control strategies, cash
and credit transaction
methods, and worksite
policies on loss
prevention and store
profit.

9E272DA82ACB454AAAF73AEA7246402D.description:
Analyze
personal and employer
responsibilities and
liabilities regarding
industry-related safety,
security, and
environmental factors.

C325B58A8FD64390A8FCE7F71A20C246.description:
Analyze
legislation, regulations,
and public policy affecting
the textiles, apparel, and
fashion industries.

BDAB416D434843019F6991D990EF191E.description:
Research
external factors, including
supply chain issues, that
affect the textile and fashion
industries.

D393B69B254D4BDA9608836550DC60F0.description:
Analyze
wholesale and retail
operational processes and
other factors affecting
profit.

DAB5671F5257431B8A2FD218CE773032.description:
Demonstrate procedures
for reporting workplace
safety incidents.

8883A42520CC4CE68DD7857A054A04EF.description:
Research
current legislation,
regulations, and public
policy in the fashion
industry.

BA6563EB41974CF5A408D90B4E774FED.description:
Identify
current events in the world
affecting the textile,
apparel, and fashion
industries.

376FD201C0A740CAA8EE20466B927150.description:
Explain
the influences of sales and
profit in the apparel and
textile industries.

5B78D5C86B8B4B34877451B6074B701C.description:
List
procedures for reporting
workplace accidents.

F1FD1895399340F78592CE2D6985A9C4.description:
Identify
textile laws and regulations
in the fashion industry.

5031EC489B834E2A9DCADADAD79BEBE8.description:
Demonstrate
professional operational practices
required for business profitability
and career success.

02791DEB2F4F42DD93C72DC826CB5C7D.description:
Create
solutions to address
customer concerns.

B9C80D7C6CC04519AB25CFF376D1944D.description:
Analyze
the influences of cultural
expectations as a factor in
customer relations.

4D41D49A5FF448BBB086CAD3C8DA1AE6.description:
Analyze
factors that contribute to
quality customer
relations.

3220884D35734BC2931BDB2662F25BC3.description:
Demonstrate the skills
necessary for quality
customer service.

EB8D15ED15394137B2B2BC771A7C1A9A.description:
Identify the
influences of cultural
diversity in customer
service and relations.

A042920B8C5F437AA3A5AC179383B45A.description:
Research
components of quality
customer relations.

535641B8A51F45B38FA757E2433DA495.description:
Explain
the skills needed in the
customer service industry.

CAA84C5C147B4412BF32AFC11332EBEE.description:
Discuss
procedures for reporting
and handling incidents of
customer complaints.

A9AFC06349394D50AF9459B7BA214595.description:
Identify
the attributes of quality
customer relations.

D97FC8A1588D4698A9F170C5766A8AD3.description:
Evaluate the
components of customer service.

846F11DFA0B842E4993A264FF8F288EB.description:
Apply
research methods,
including forecasting
techniques, for marketing
textiles, fashion, and
apparel.

C34DA93650A7424499D7B6D241183D48.description:
Critique
a variety of methods for
promoting textiles,
fashion, and apparel to
diverse populations.

015A58B747514FE3ACDC2130A1151433.description:
Analyze
ethical considerations for
merchandising textiles,
fashion, and apparel.

55AEFE52246D47CD84519C5A8BBD3056.description:
Analyze
the cost of constructing,
manufacturing,
distributing, altering,
repairing, or recycling
textiles, fashion, and
apparel.

5D46104088AC4FDE9A5D284B0C2C2707.description:
Explore
trends in textiles, fashion,
and apparel.

EE93776138BD4CAF8B3625A33950FC4A.description:
Analyze
external factors that
influence merchandising.

14CAE3CA2F584F8691D49318E80AC702.description:
Research
the need for ethical
considerations in
merchandising textiles,
apparel, and fashion.

E2CCD88820374550A696AC5E00D4644A.description:
Apply
marketing strategies for
textiles, fashion, and
apparel in the global
marketplace.

A14D2A0B76534E8EBF213B34BD6E7A8B.description:
Define
terminology related to
forecasting and marketing.

017145CD7CFA492C9C35C3423DEFB7AD.description:
Explore
use of media to market
apparel and textile
products.

8E7ED6E32F48432F9796F60471AA205F.description:
Identify
ethical considerations in
the industry.

7CD9DDEB611D46CAAE3B93033FD5E46E.description:
Explore
advertising and marketing
strategies in the
marketplace.

EE87BBD281FB4E7C92EE73E4138C86A2.description:
Evaluate elements of
textile, apparel, and fashion
merchandising.

A73047D58C99414890C984286A459D47.description:
Use
appropriate industry
products and materials
for cleaning, pressing, and
finishing textiles, fashion,
and apparel.

FDE3647357ED43E0ABF230667730E6C7.description:
Analyze
current technology,
trends, and innovations
that facilitate design and
production of textiles,
fashion, and apparel.

44AF5674F8F44ADFA3E3ACE0108CCE33.description:
Demonstrate professional
skills in using traditional
and technologically
innovative equipment,
tools, and supplies in
textiles, fashion, and
apparel construction,
alteration, repair, and
recycling.

4D74737AE4214153848B349B1869149D.description:
Demonstrate basic skills
of production, alteration,
repair, and recycling of
textiles, fashion, and
apparel.

9931F6C2F1744132ACC1FEE59D6DEC67.description:
Explain the
effects of textile
characteristics on design,
construction, care, use, and
maintenance of products.

5B81E33B91D24C16993486DE603C2B82.description:
Explain
production processes for
creating fibers, yarn, woven
and knit fabrics, and
nonwoven textile products.

6F7767A526F44A869750F4364817E314.description:
Practice
traditional skills used in
textiles, such as hand
embroidery, knitting,
crocheting, weaving, and
quilting. Investigate
innovative use of new and
old technology used to
create, repair, and upcycle
textiles, including but not
limited to machine
embroidery, 3D printing,
surface design, etc.

22F82E76D70C4DC086D9235BC1A4BBD2.description:
Practice
construction and repair
skills, including but not
limited to straight and
curved seams, hand
stitching, hemming,
fasteners, embellishing,
seam finishing, etc.

C127D6DF89A14BECBC6606D7564D1D15.description:
Select
appropriate fabrics and
materials for specific uses.

2996E8ABD801447587300E569A6EBBE7.description:
Identify
equipment and terminology
used in fashion and apparel
construction.

9793B4A20B144881BE98569FE41026B5.description:
Identify
and define traditional and
innovative textile
equipment and
construction skills, tools,
and terminology.

59774DEE53E94747AAAC588046F4B143.description:
Identify
skills, tools, and equipment
needed in the construction,
repair, and upcycling or
recycling of textiles.

32886E688F6949F980AAE4FC128E96C3.description:
Demonstrate skills
needed to produce, alter, or repair
textiles, fashion, and apparel.

0DFB06AA3A2F464785E5550F6D656E99.description:
Evaluate
the impact of the history
of design and designers,
arts and culture,
trendsetters, and global
influences on textiles,
fashion, and apparel.

B5D91CFF492B4E2ABA570AD8B633C2C8.description:
Generate design that
demonstrates
consideration for
ecological,
environmental, ethnic,
sociological,
psychological, technical,
and economic trends and
issues.

A4D81BD6F4EB41209218C0036A8C18C4.description:
Demonstrate design
concepts using fiber,
fabric, or digital means,
employing draping or flat
pattern-making
techniques.

41374864B1E44156B1C28088438ADF6F.description:
Demonstrate the ability
to use technology for
fashion, apparel, and
textile design.

EE6BB1613D024D94A923B7F81E278E40.description:
Use
elements and principles of
design in designing,
constructing, or altering
textiles, fashion, and
apparel.

81865288305047D58155C50B4DE19CB3.description:
Apply
elements and principles of
design to assist
consumers and
businesses in making
decisions.

A4DA367386C54BCEBCDF717443886425.description:
Research
the history of design and
designers, arts and culture,
trendsetters, and global
influences on textiles,
fashion, and apparel.

65F11A17595C44148EA0CC489E76F2AC.description:
Research
ecological, environmental,
ethnic, sociological,
psychological, technical, and
economic trends and issues
that affect textile, fashion,
and apparel design.

A51B53A4C9934D6FAD1C5A6B9FD0DE21.description:
Practice
design concepts in fiber,
fabric, or digital draping and
flat pattern-making
techniques.

1894B602B7F641A48A2C855243D3A670.description:
Choose
appropriate technology to
use in fashion, apparel, and
textile design.

CF64435A2FF8428CB50CB812E2D439AE.description:
Explain the
use of elements and
principles of design in
designing, constructing, and
altering textiles, fashion,
and apparel.

403317401EA24717889429780AABA171.description:
Apply basic
and complex color schemes
and color theory to develop
and enhance visual effects.

2EB5A0BD57864FBFBDFCB05458F40934.description:
Identify
historical time periods and
trends in textiles, fashion,
and apparel.

8806A311DAE3453790AC37BE5E087449.description:
Identify
ecological, environmental,
ethnic, sociological,
psychological, technical,
and economic trends and
issues that affect textile,
fashion, and apparel design.

983151CBC4B04FD2A2D1085F9A03667E.description:
Identify
skills needed for draping
and flat pattern-making.

B8D3BA4BDE5A48FBA826C33DB772C60D.description:
Explore
technology used for
fashion, apparel, and textile
design.

3489FCCC9D804606953F750BA4A38659.description:
Identify
the elements and principles
of design.

7F10A514D62D481899220A91CC84CEA7.description:
Explain
the ways in which fiber,
fabric, texture, pattern,
and finish can affect visual
appearance.

7B6CF2E0DE114212A580EBE551F2C3CD.description:
Demonstrate textiles,
fashion, and apparel design skills.

227A330F5D9342E6BE2AF63CB3F9F91D.description:
Evaluate
quality of textiles,
fashion, and apparel
construction and fit.

7000CB2629084DC8B659AED3E80CE060.description:
Analyze
characteristics of textile
components in the design,
construction, care, use,
maintenance, and
disposal or recycling of
products.

034C74FA9607465F8B02C2EC6F0EFE88.description:
Analyze
textile legislation,
standards, and labeling in
the global economy.

F6F530144C7445779BA56CDCFB21641A.description:
Evaluate
performance
characteristics of textile
fibers and fabrics.

776617105F75405EBD9B8D8DA1C712BF.description:
Evaluate
fibers and fabrics for
sustainability factors.

A5E407A53E97473C91B4F232A12169B2.description:
Demonstrate appropriate
procedures for care,
disposal, or recycling of
textile products,
considering diverse needs
locally and globally.

FD64F649C63C4B709DE765855ADEFB08.description:
Describe
textile legislation, standards,
and labeling in the global
economy.

8FEC6DC0A7E94AF4AACDFD3C2585DA28.description:
Apply
appropriate terminology
for identifying, comparing,
and analyzing the most
common generic textile
fibers.

5DD5739890BB4A5A815B58C3D3CCD685.description:
Identify a
variety of fibers and fabrics
used in textiles, fashion,
and apparel construction.

D123A7D8EF0D4D4D9B2D3F868C5D7282.description:
Assess
appropriate procedures for
care of various textile
products.

35E13A69367849D6946E4FA3C3BBB702.description:
Evaluate textiles,
fashion, and apparel products and
materials and their use in diverse
settings.

CBB37C54617741458A8C1DF40C5132D6.description:
Analyze
the role of professional
organizations in textiles,
fashion, and apparel
industries.

685AD88C76824DC5BE70EA4C50D047EB.description:
Analyze
the effects of textiles,
fashion, and apparel
industries on local, state,
national, and global
economies.

980C44014EAD4FBD84B244C179308510.description:
Create
an employment portfolio
to communicate textiles,
fashion, and apparel
knowledge and skills.

0CAC16DDA71C4F869E1AC7F54B6B87E9.description:
Analyze
opportunities for
employment in textiles
and apparel careers and
entrepreneurial
endeavors.

F2A9807B0256408682F552EFF548D43A.description:
Explore the
role of professional
organizations in textiles,
fashion, and apparel
industries.

ECAC15F475BF405EA0D34DBB3E68C2F0.description:
Research
the effects of textiles,
fashion, and apparel
industries on local, state,
national, and global
economies.

A00FBD99E80A449B9B14BF8E2CDFE6E2.description:
Summarize
education and training
requirements and
opportunities for career
paths in textiles, fashion,
and apparel industries.

2B0A890770754DE0850DA8480144F71C.description:
Explain the
roles and functions of
individuals engaged in
textiles and apparel
careers.

C9C4A4AC993248E9A0B618ABA96C811D.description:
Identify
professional organizations
related to textile, apparel,
and design industries.

96433D27EB3642D69FF5C0034B6918CA.description:
Introduce
the effects textiles, fashion,
and apparel industries can
have on employment
opportunities and local
economies.

CC17D594B3F4499DB03554F364D51125.description:
Examine
knowledge and skills
needed to work in the
textile, fashion, and apparel
industries.

5D08FD6D521F4727B58A4750C2232480.description:
Identify
traditional and nontraditional employment
opportunities in the textile
and apparel services.

E6B1BDAA78714DC7950082FE73ADE8CA.description:
Analyze career paths
within the textile apparel and
design industries.

781DD5F83EEF4F5090FB8D64E2FCDFE1.description: Students will integrate knowledge, skills, and practices required for careers in textiles and apparel.
